home.heroSubtitle: Your central place to explore, learn and apply AI at Qualogy
home.trendingDescription: Most discussed AI insights across Qualogy this week

home.noPostsInChannel: No posts in this channel yet.
home.exploreMoreDescription: Discover more AI topics and join conversations that match your interests

channels.title: Channels
channels.subtitle: Explore communities and find your tribe

channelDetail.signInToJoin: Please sign in to join channels.

channelDetail.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
channelDetail.leftChannelMessage: You've left {{channelName}}. You can rejoin anytime.
channelDetail.leaveConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to leave this channel? You'll no longer receive updates from this community, but you can rejoin anytime.
